text:
@realDonaldTrump You wasted 2 weeks calling it a hoax along with Sean Hannity. You've also been ignoring Gov. Cuomo who has practically begged the government for ventilators and masks among other tools. This mess is partly your fault and people are dying because of it.
#CoronaVirus
